```scss
// Property: leftDrawerLockMode
// Description: Get or set lock mode for the left drawer
// Component(s): Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout
'.left-drawer-lock-mode-locked-closed': { leftDrawerLockMode: Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout.LOCK_MODE_LOCKED_CLOSED }
'.left-drawer-lock-mode-locked-open': { leftDrawerLockMode: Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout.LOCK_MODE_LOCKED_OPEN }
'.left-drawer-lock-mode-undefined': { leftDrawerLockMode: Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout.LOCK_MODE_UNDEFINED }
'.left-drawer-lock-mode-unlocked': { leftDrawerLockMode: Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout.LOCK_MODE_UNLOCKED }
```
